Kiwi. Original Lip Balm

At Kiwi, our mission is to nourish skin naturally by crafting locally sourced, vegan personal care products that are as pure as they are effective. From our salves to our soup and lip balms - we use only clean, plant-based ingredients - free from preservatives and synthetic additives.
